item.description:
I'm Jen Bonardi, the Executive Director of the Ford Hall Forum
(FHF) in downtown Boston. The FHF offers FREE discussions with
great speakers and always gives the audience a chance to ask
questions.

I thought that the members of the MA Campaign for Liberty would
be interested in attending "From the Government and Here to
Help" this season. It’s a debate between the President of the
Ayn Rand Institute and the Co-Founder of Demos on whether we
need more or less government. Expect sparks to fly at this
riveting exchange!

DATE: Thursday, September 29
TIME: 6:30 PM - 8:00 PM
PLACE: Suffolk University’s C. Walsh Theatre (downtown)

For all of the info, please go to www.fordhallforum.org .

http://www.fordhallforum.org/programs/help
item.name: From the Government and Here to Help - Debate
